tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE call_escalation_patterns (
  call_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  caller_name VARCHAR(50),
  escalation_level INT,
  call_date TIMESTAMP,
  call_duration INT
)

CREATE TABLE escalation_logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  caller_id INT,
  escalation_level INT,
  log_description TEXT,
  log_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE escalation_history (
    escalation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    call_id INT,
    escalated_to VARCHAR(255),
    escalation_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    previous_level INT
);
CREATE TABLE calls (    call_id INT PRIMARY KEY,    caller_name VARCHAR(255),    call_timestamp TIMESTAMP,    escalation_level INT );
CREATE TABLE escalation_levels (    escalation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,    escalation_name VARCHAR(255) );
CREATE TABLE support_agents (    agent_id INT PRIMARY KEY,    agent_name VARCHAR(255),    agent_email VARCHAR(255),    agent_phone VARCHAR(15) );
CREATE TABLE call_history (    call_id INT,    agent_id INT,    escalation_id INT,    call_duration INT,    call_notes TEXT );

CREATE TABLE calls (
    call_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    call_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    caller_id INT,
    agent_id INT,
    escalation_level INT
);

CREATE TABLE escalations (
    escalation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    call_id INT,
    escalation_level INT,
    escalation_reason TEXT,
    escalation_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE escalation_history (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    escalation_id INT,
    previous_level INT,
    new_level INT,
    escalation_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
